Investor_14.content: I have consistently demonstrated my commitment to ethical investment practices, with a particular focus on ensuring that allocation plans are fair and align with my expectations. Despite previous challenges, my responsible communication and steadfast manner have bolstered my standing as a discerning and reliable investor within the community.

Trustee_10.content: The trustee, Mohammed Al-Farsi, has faced a setback in reputation following the rejection of his proposed allocation plan. Trustee_17.content: The rejection of my proposed allocation plan by Juan Carlos Reyes reflects poorly on my reliability as a trustee. While I aimed to provide a fair allocation that adhered to my responsibilities, the lack of alignment with the investor's ethical standards has led to the early termination of our potential investment. This outcome highlights the need for clearer communication regarding expectations and ethical considerations in future dealings. My reputation for trustworthy behavior is currently at risk due to this incident, suggesting a need for improvement in my approach.

Trustee_14.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14.content: My reputation has taken a significant hit after my allocation plan was rejected by Maria Rossi. The proposed profit distribution of 70% to the investor and 30% to myself was deemed unfair, which highlights a critical failure in my ability to create proposals that align with investor expectations for equitable practices. This incident is part of a troubling pattern, as my acceptance rate is currently at 0.36, reflecting my struggles in ensuring trustworthiness and competence in my proposals. I must now focus on improving my understanding of investor priorities and developing balanced allocation plans to restore my reputation.
